posts.post_content: N162 Dunlap for sale.  SGC 50, back is clean.  First PM for $700.
Can everyone see the image for the card?  I heard that the image isn't showing up in the thread.
Nope....I don't see one I'm afraid...

Is the image visible?  If not, please let me know.  Thank you!


[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=339809&stc=1&d=1546811850[/url]
Fred, I wouldn't mind having another Dunlap "Detroit" variation in the collection, they rarely surface, I'll take it.

Sorry for the late response.  The card is no longer available.  Yeah, from what I've heard the Detroit version is the tougher of the two teams (other team being Pittsburgh).  

I was told I had the price too low for that variation.  Maybe I'll be able to find another one some day.
